core.game.callback
Interface CallBackBuffered

All Known Implementing Classes:
CallBackBufferedObject
public interface CallBackBuffered

this interface defines which methods must be present in objects that wish to act as callback operator

Author:
Mike

Method Summary
 void checkCallBackBuffer()
          should be implemented to check whether or not the buffer was updated, and if so, to call processCalls with as parameter all calls on the buffer
 void processCalls(CallBackObject[] calls)
          should be implemented to operate on an array of CallBackObjects, and is where all the real processing should occur
 void registerCall(CallBackObject call)
          should be implemented to register a call to the callbackbuffer
 void setCallBackCheckInterval(long ms)
          should be implemented to change whatever interval is being used as default sleep interval
 void sleep()
          should be implemented to try to put a thread to sleep for a prespecified amount of time
 void sleep(long ms)
          should be implemented to try to put a thread to sleep for a specified amount of time
